

```javascript
const engine = {
    protocol: 1,
    Server: {},
    Socket: {},
    Transport: {},
    transports: {},
    parser: {},
    listen: function(){},
    attach: function(){}
};
```

```javascript
const engine.Server = {
    clients: {},
    clientsCount: 0,
    
    wsEngine: 'uws' || 'ws',
    
    pingTimeout: 60000,
    pingInterval: 25000,
    upgradeTimeout: 10000,

    maxHttpBufferSize: 10e7,

    transports: ['polling', 'websocket'],
    allowUpgrades: true,
    allowRequest: undefined,
    
    cookie: 'io',
    cookiePath: '/',
    cookieHttpOnly: true,

    perMessageDeflate: {},
    httpCompression: {
        threshold: 1024
    },
    initialPacket: undefined,

    ws：{优先采用uws然后才是ws}
};
```

const engine.Server.ws = {
